languages.text: {n}Маражай морщится, словно услышал что-то неприятное.{/n} "Ты... нарушаешь правила игры. Будь внимательнее, если желаешь продолжать ее".
{n}Marazhai makes a face as though he has just heard something unpleasant.{/n} "You... are breaking the rules of the game. You should tread more carefully if you wish to continue it."
languages.original_text: {n}Маражай морщится, словно услышал что-то неприятное.{/n} "Ты... нарушаешь правила игры. Будь внимательнее, если желаешь продолжать ее".

languages.text: {n}玛拉斋的脸色很难看，仿佛听到了什么令人不快的话一样。{/n}“你……这是在破坏游戏规则。如果你打算继续这场游戏的话，应该更加当心才是。”
languages.original_text: {n}Marazhai makes a face as though he has just heard something unpleasant.{/n} "You... are breaking the rules of the game. You should tread more carefully if you wish to continue it."

traits.locale_text: {n}玛拉斋的脸色很难看，仿佛听到了什么令人不快的话一样。{/n}“你……这是在破坏游戏规则。如果你打算继续这场游戏的话，应该更加当心才是。”

languages.text: {n}マラズハイは、嫌な事を聞​​いたかのような顔になる。{/n}「お前…それはゲームのルール違反だろう。まだ遊びたいなら、もっと慎重に行動するんだな」
languages.original_text: {n}Marazhai makes a face as though he has just heard something unpleasant.{/n} "You... are breaking the rules of the game. You should tread more carefully if you wish to continue it."

traits.locale_text: {n}マラズハイは、嫌な事を聞​​いたかのような顔になる。{/n}「お前…それはゲームのルール違反だろう。まだ遊びたいなら、もっと慎重に行動するんだな」

languages.text: {n}Por la cara que pone Marazhai, no le gusta lo que acaba de oír.{/n} «Estás... rompiendo las reglas del juego. Ve con más cuidado si quieres seguir disfrutando de él».
languages.original_text: {n}Marazhai makes a face as though he has just heard something unpleasant.{/n} "You... are breaking the rules of the game. You should tread more carefully if you wish to continue it."

traits.locale_text: {n}Por la cara que pone Marazhai, no le gusta lo que acaba de oír.{/n} «Estás... rompiendo las reglas del juego. Ve con más cuidado si quieres seguir disfrutando de él».

languages.text: {n}Marazhai esquisse une grimace, comme s'il était contrarié par votre réaction.{/n} « Vous... prenez un gros risque en modifiant les règles du jeu. Méfiez-vous, ou la partie risque de tourner court. »
languages.original_text: {n}Marazhai makes a face as though he has just heard something unpleasant.{/n} "You... are breaking the rules of the game. You should tread more carefully if you wish to continue it."

traits.locale_text: {n}Marazhai esquisse une grimace, comme s'il était contrarié par votre réaction.{/n} « Vous... prenez un gros risque en modifiant les règles du jeu. Méfiez-vous, ou la partie risque de tourner court. »

languages.text: {n}Marazhai verzieht das Gesicht, als hätte er gerade etwas Unerfreuliches gehört.{/n} "Ihr ... brecht die Regeln des Spiels. Ihr solltet vorsichtiger vorgehen, wenn Ihr weitermachen wollt."
languages.original_text: {n}Marazhai makes a face as though he has just heard something unpleasant.{/n} "You... are breaking the rules of the game. You should tread more carefully if you wish to continue it."

traits.locale_text: {n}Marazhai verzieht das Gesicht, als hätte er gerade etwas Unerfreuliches gehört.{/n} "Ihr ... brecht die Regeln des Spiels. Ihr solltet vorsichtiger vorgehen, wenn Ihr weitermachen wollt."

languages.text: {n}Marazhai'ın yüzüne, hoşuna gitmeyen bir söz duymuş gibi bir ifade bürünüyor.{/n} "Sen... Oyunun kurallarını bozuyorsun. Oyuna devam etmek istiyorsan daha ihtiyatlı davranmalısın."
languages.original_text: {n}Marazhai makes a face as though he has just heard something unpleasant.{/n} "You... are breaking the rules of the game. You should tread more carefully if you wish to continue it."
